description: As you may have guessed, this is my other website. In my spare time I enjoy taking pictures. Mainly I like to photograph cars, but when I go somewhere I also like to take my camera with me.

M.T.C.Vlijmen is a local motorcycle club from North Brabant. This club asked me if I could make a new website that was also available for mobile. There was also a wish to be able to easily edit text themself, so I created a system where they can easily edit a text document and automatically adjust the text on the website.
